titles.title: President Ronald W. Reagan resolution
A resolution relative to the death of Ronald Wilson Reagan, the 40th President of the United States.
A resolution relative to the death of Ronald Wilson Reagan, the 40th President of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on each day of June 7 through 11 it do so as a further mark of respect in memory of the late Ronald Wilson Reagan (the 40th President of the United States).
